activity: Lip trill warmup: Start on a comfortable low note, bubble your lips while sliding up to your highest comfortable note, then back down. Repeat 5 times.
done_condition: when you've done 5 full slides up and down

activity: Lip trill scales: Do lip trills on a 5-note scale (do-re-mi-fa-sol-fa-mi-re-do), moving up by half steps until it gets hard. Focus on keeping the trill consistent.
done_condition: when you've done scales up to your break point and back down

activity: Sustained lip trills: Pick 3 different pitches (low, mid, high). Hold a lip trill on each for as long as you can. Notice where you lose the trill.
done_condition: when you've sustained trills on 3 pitches

activity: Tongue trill (rolled R) warmup: If you can do tongue trills, slide from low to high and back 5 times. If not, practice getting the trill started on a single pitch.
done_condition: when you've done 5 slides or practiced for 3 minutes

activity: Alternating trills: Do a 5-note scale on lip trill, then the same scale on tongue trill (or hum if tongue trill is hard). Repeat 3 times, moving up by half steps.
done_condition: when you've done 3 rounds of alternating scales

activity: Siren warmup: On 'wee' or 'ooh', slide smoothly from your lowest note to your highest and back down. Do 5 full sirens, focusing on smooth transitions.
done_condition: when you've done 5 full sirens

activity: Humming warmup: Hum a 5-note scale up and down, feeling the vibration in your face (mask resonance). Move up by half steps for 2 minutes.
done_condition: when you've hummed scales for 2+ minutes

activity: Vowel warmup: On one pitch, sing through all vowels (ah-eh-ee-oh-oo) keeping jaw relaxed and soft palate lifted. Move up by half steps. Do for 3 minutes.
done_condition: when you've done vowel sequences for 3 minutes

activity: Staccato 'ha' exercise: On a 5-note scale, sing short staccato 'ha' sounds (engage your core). This builds breath support. Do 5 rounds moving up.
done_condition: when you've done 5 rounds of staccato scales

activity: Diaphragmatic breathing: Lie down or sit tall. Hand on belly. Inhale for 4 counts (belly rises), exhale on 'ssss' for 8 counts (belly falls). Do 5 cycles.
done_condition: when you've done 5 breath cycles

activity: Sustained exhale: Inhale fully, then exhale on a steady 'ssss' or 'shhhh' for as long as possible. Time yourself. Do 5 reps, trying to extend each time.
done_condition: when you've done 5 sustained exhales

activity: Panting exercise: Pant like a dog for 10 seconds (feel your diaphragm), then immediately slow to a long 'sss' exhale. Repeat 3 times. Connects fast breath to slow release.
done_condition: when you've done 3 pant-to-slow cycles

activity: Pick the hardest phrase from your current singing assignment. Sing it 10 times slowly, focusing on the specific thing your teacher mentioned.
done_condition: when you've sung the phrase 10 times

activity: Sing through your current piece on 'la' or a lip trill—no lyrics. Focus purely on pitch accuracy and breath phrasing.
done_condition: when you've sung through the piece once on 'la'

activity: Speak through your current piece's lyrics in rhythm—no melody. Exaggerate consonants. Notice where you rush or stumble.
done_condition: when you've spoken through the lyrics twice

activity: Sing through your current assignment piece from start to finish. Don't stop for mistakes—perform it like it's a take. Note what needs work after.
done_condition: when you've done one complete run-through

activity: Identify the passage you're avoiding in your current piece. Slow it down by 50%. Sing it 5 times at half speed, then 3 times at normal speed.
done_condition: when you've done 5 slow + 3 normal reps

activity: Jaw release: Massage your jaw joints in circles. Then let your jaw hang loose and sigh 'ah' 5 times. Your jaw should feel floppy, not locked.
done_condition: when you've massaged and done 5 loose 'ah' sighs

activity: Soft palate exercise: Say 'hung-ah' 10 times, feeling the soft palate lift on 'ah'. Then sustain an 'ah' with that lifted feeling for 10 seconds. Repeat 3 times.
done_condition: when you've done the hung-ah sequence 3 times

activity: 'NG' slide exercise: Hum on 'ng' (like end of 'sing'), slide up and down your range. This finds your head voice. Do 5 full slides.
done_condition: when you've done 5 full NG slides
